name: Cubelicious (TheGameDeath)
description:
This tiny riddle game was made in a self challange on completing a short game by myself without using any tutorials, assets or help (therefore the resolutionsetting might not work properly :P ). Only some of the music is by these great music- and SFX artists on Freesound.org. Big thanks to them for providing a handful of incredible sounds for this game.

P.S. There is one huge typo and i am really ashamed of it, please forgive me <3

Lagmusics - virtual heavy-metal https://freesound.org/people/LagMusics/sounds/578908/ public license

mellau - dark-athmosphere-drone https://freesound.org/people/Mellau/sounds/505666/ public license
clacksberg - cosmic-minimal-music-fragment https://freesound.org/people/Clacksberg/sounds/506324/

harrisonlace - synth-loop-replicant https://freesound.org/people/harrisonlace/sounds/670030/

reidmangan spotlight https://freesound.org/people/reidmangan/sounds/49023/

doty21 robot noise https://freesound.org/people/dotY21/sounds/321866/
